Source:
This product is a work of fiction.
There is no relation between real people, groups, places or incidents.

This product is owned by VisualArts. Consent of the company is required to use this software or its parts in any way other than private use; reproducing, modifying, uploading to the internet and using P2P software to share and distribute it is prohibited by law.
Target:
本产品纯属虚构
与真实的人物，组织，地点或事件之间没有关系。

本产品归VisualArts所有。除私人用途外，使用本软件或其部分须征得本公司同意；禁止复制、修改、上传到互联网，以及使用P2P软件进行分享和传播。

Source:
Do you want to turn on the Battle Sequence?
(Turning it off will not hinder the story progression.)
Target:
是否开启战斗过程？
（关闭后不会影响故事进度。）

Source:
Do you want to turn on the Batting Practice?
(Turning it off will not hinder the story progression.)
Target:
是否开启棒球练习？
（关闭后不会影响故事进度。）

Source:
Do you want to turn on the Battle Rankings?
(Turning it off will not hinder the story progression.)
Target:
是否开启战斗排位赛？
（关闭后不会影响故事进度。）

Source:
Do you want to turn on the shooting game?
If turned on, you can choose normal mode or easy mode.
(Turning it on or changing to easy will not affect the story.)
Target:
是否开启射击游戏？
如果开启，可以选择普通模式或简单模式。
（开启或更改为简单模式不会影响故事。）

Source:
Do you want to reset Saya's root?
(If yes, you will get to start over her route.)
Target:
是否重置沙耶的路线？
（如果选择是，您将重新开始她的路线。）

Source: Would you like to start the game from the selected message?
Target: 是否从选定的消息开始游戏？
通关信息(系统数据)已保存。

Source: Do you wish to load this?
The saved data is corrupted and can not be loaded.
Target: 保存数据已损坏，无法加载。

Source: Are you sure you wish to overwrite?
Are you sure you wish to delete this?
Are you sure you wish to quit the game?
Do you wish to jump to the beginning of this chapter?
Target: 是否跳转到本章的开头？

Source: Do you wish to jump to the previous chapter?
Do you wish to jump to the previous choice?
Target: 是否跳转到上一个选择？

Source: Do you wish to jump to the next choice or chapter?
Target: 是否跳转到下一个选择或章节？

Source: Do you wish to jump to the next chapter?
Do you wish to jump to the next choice?
Target: 是否跳转到下一个选择？

Source: Quick save can not be used.
Because there is unread text,$djump stopped at that position.
Target: 因为有未读文本，$djump在该位置停止。

Source: Do you wish to jump to the next option or chapter?
Target: 是否跳转到下一个选项或章节？

Source: Would you like to return this page to the default settings?
Target: 是否将此页面恢复为默认设置？

Source: $K1Settings$K0 such as character feed speed are reflected.
Target: $K1设置$K0（例如角色显示速度）已反映。

Source: Do you delete all saved data including system data from the cloud and return the game to the initial state? (Deleting it can not be undone)
Target: 是否删除包括系统数据在内的所有保存数据，并将游戏恢复到初始状态？（删除后无法撤销）

Source: Reset all Achievements. Is it OK?
$A1The system data is corrupted and can not be loaded.
【Voice】If you select ❝Continue❞, voice will continue to flow even if you send a page during voice playback.$S024$C[606060]（It stops if there is voice on the next page）
Target: 【语音】如果选择❝继续❞，语音将在语音播放期间换页时继续播放。$S024$C[606060]（如果下一页有语音，则会停止）

Source: 【Wait Time Per Character】In auto mode, this sets the wait time until the next message is displayed based on the number of characters in text.
Target: 【每字符等待时间】在自动模式下，根据文本中的字符数量设置到显示下一条消息的等待时间。

Source: 【Base Wait Time】You can set a Base Wait Time to add to ❝Wait Time Per Character❞.
Target: 【基本等待时间】您可以将基本等待时间添加到“每个角色的等待时间”中。

Source: 【Gesture】If you set it to ❝On❞, you can use the same gesture as the touch operation such as flick with the mouse.
Target: 【手势】如果设为❝开启❞，您可以使用与触控操作相同的手势，例如用鼠标滑动。

Source:
Drag in the message window to skip.
Auto skip by swiping (unlock by tapping).
Target:
在消息窗中拖动以跳过.
通过滑动自动跳过(通过点击解锁).

Source:
Drag in the message window to rewind.
Flick and auto swiping (unlock by tapping).
Target:
在消息窗中拖动以回退.
通过滑动自动回退(通过点击解锁).

Source: Swipe outside the message window jumps to next choice, or the end of previously read text.
Target: 在消息窗口外滑动跳转到下一个选择，或跳转到已读文本的末尾。

Source: Swipe outside the message window to jump to previous choice.
Target: 在消息窗口外滑动跳转到上一个选择。

Source: Changes to the sound API settings will not take effect until the game is restarted.
Target: 更改声音API设置后，需重新启动游戏才能生效。

Source: Girls can roll it up and use it as a sword. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 女生可以把它卷起来当作剑来用。（By 恭介）

Source: Since some people throw pieces of eraser during classes, I give the green light. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 有些人会在课堂上扔橡皮擦碎片，我批准了。（By 恭介）

Source: Well, it's okay to throw it. Some teachers do that. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 嗯，扔出去也没关系。有些老师也会这么做。（By 恭介）

Source: It's okay to throw pillows like you would in a pillow fight. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 像枕头大战一样扔枕头也是可以的。（By 恭介）

Source: It's okay to throw the soil from Koshien like you would be praying. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 像祈祷一样扔甲子园的土也是可以的。（By 恭介）

Source: His shape is just asking to be thrown anyway, I give the green light. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 他的形状本来就是让人想扔的，所以我批准了。（By 恭介）

Source: Guys can only use the soft rubber part. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 男生只能用软橡胶的部分。（By 恭介）

Source: Guys can only use the netting. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 男生只能用网的部分。（By 恭介）

Source: I saw people striking each other with burdock on TV, so it's ok to just hit with it. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 我在电视上看到有人用牛蒡互相击打，所以用它打是可以的。（By 恭介）

Source: Masato has already used it in a battle, so I give the green light. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 因为真人已经在战斗中使用过它了，所以我批准了。（By 恭介）

Source: You can only fight by manipulating the hero. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 你只能通过操控英雄来战斗。（By 恭介）

Source: You can only fight by manipulating the phantom. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 你只能通过操控幻影来战斗。（By 恭介）

Source: You can only fight by manipulating the robot.(By Kyousuke)
Target: 你只能通过操控机器人来战斗。（By 恭介）

Source: You may attack by dancing to the rhythm, but you have to close your eyes for immersion. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 你可以通过节奏舞蹈来攻击，但必须闭上眼睛以便更专注。（By 恭介）

Source: Guys can use it the way they would smack flies. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 男生可以像拍苍蝇一样用它。（By 恭介）

Source: It's okay to shoot the rubber band from your finger. Kids play like that all the time. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 用手指射出橡皮筋是可以的。小孩总是那样玩。（By 恭介）

Source: It's actually dangerous to point fireworks at someone, don't try this at home. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 把烟火对准别人其实很危险，不要在家尝试。（By 恭介）

Source: Just go ahead and throw it after you're done folding it. It's just paper anyway. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 折好之后就扔出去吧。反正它只是纸而已。（By 恭介）

Source: It's a weapon of great potential against girls who hate bugs. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 对于讨厌虫子的女孩来说，它是有很大潜力的武器。（By 恭介）

Source: Well, if worse comes to worst, you may throw it too. I give the green light. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 嗯，实在不行的话，你也可以扔出去。我批准了。（By 恭介）

Source: If you can count up to 9999, it's your victory. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 如果你能数到9999，那就算你赢了。（By 恭介）

Source: Rolling the same numbers equals your opponent's death. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 掷出相同的数字等于你的对手死亡。（By 恭介）

Source: I give permission to hit with the parasol. But you can only hit guys seriously. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 我允许用阳伞打人。但你只能认真地打男生。（By 恭介）

Source: Before you attack, you must say ❝I will not forgive the lot of you!❞. (By Kyousuke)
Target: 在攻击前，你必须说❝我绝不会原谅你们这帮人！❞。（By 恭介）

Source: Now then, what should I do...
Now then, what should I do... We don't have anyone to play center field so it's rather tricky...
Target: 那么，现在该怎么办呢…我们没有人能打中场，这很棘手…

Source: This is my last chance to make changes. I should decide this carefully.
Target: 这是我最后一次做出改变的机会。我应该慎重决定。

Source: That's Kyousuke for you. He decided everything in an instant, and he certainly thought it through...
Target: 不愧是恭介。他瞬间就决定了所有事情，而且显然深思熟虑了…

Source: An impenetrable formation... Wait, she just wants everyone around herself!
Target: 无懈可击的阵型…等等，她只是想把所有人留在自己身边！

Source: Wow, that's actually not bad at all... Wait, there are two Masatos!
Target: 哇，其实这还不错…等等，居然有两个真人！

Source: What sort of parallel world is that...
Target: 那是怎样的平行世界啊…

Source: Rejected on the grounds of plain impossibility...
Target: 因为明显不可能，所以被拒绝了…

Source: Who are they asking, and what about...?
Target: 他们在问谁，又在问什么…？

Source: Male Student@❝Hey, there's nothing on the tray!❞
Target: 男学生@❝喂，托盘上什么都没有！❞

Target: `男学生@❝能不能给我点能吃的东西！？❞

Target: `男学生@❝这不是哪里有问题吗？❞

Target: `男学生@❝喂，这不是哪里有问题吗？❞

`Male Student@❝Hey, what kind of joke is that!?❞

`Female Student@❝You didn't put anything on it...?❞
`Female Student@❝There's no jelly... I didn't really want it, though.❞
Target: `女学生@❝没有果冻…不过我也不太想要。❞

Target: `女学生@❝我吃不完这么多味增汤…❞

`女学生@❝那个炸猪排是干嘛的！？❞

Target: `女学生@❝你为什么要给我炸猪排…?❞

Source: `Female Student@❝When did I ask for fried prawns?❞
Target: `女学生@❝我什么时候点过炸虾了？❞

`Female Student@❝Should the jelly really be there?❞
Target: `女学生@❝果冻真的应该在这里吗？❞

Target: `女学生@❝我才不会点这么高热量的东西！？❞

Target: `女学生@❝这根本不是一顿午餐！❞

Target: `女学生@❝这甚至不是一顿午餐！❞
`女学生@❝这是什么奇怪的组合！？❞

Target: `女学生@❝怎么能面不改色地端上这种东西…❞

Target: `女学生@❝喂…我真希望这只是个玩笑…❞

`男学生@❝炸猪排咖喱，太幸运了！❞

Target: `男学生@❝卷心菜和咖喱不搭配！❞

Source: `Kyousuke@❝There's still some time until the game, but don't get careless!❞
Target: `恭介@❝离比赛还有一段时间，但不要松懈！❞

Target: `恭介@❝比赛快到了，打起精神来！❞

Source: `Kyousuke@❝The game is tomorrow, Riki, let loose the dogs of war!❞
Target: `恭介@❝比赛是明天，理树，让战争爆发吧！❞

`Kyousuke@❝Aight, that was a good sweat, let's end it here.❞
Target: `恭介@❝好了，流了不少汗，就到这里吧。❞

Source: `Kyousuke@❝Aight, let's end it here. We really have been getting better by the day.❞
Target: `恭介@❝好了，就到这里吧。我们真的每天都在进步。❞

Source: Is, isn't Rin looking different from usual!?
Target: 理树，铃看起来和平时不太一样！？

Source: Fortunately she didn't seem to be hurt.
Target: 很幸运，她似乎没有受伤。
`库特@❝哇，汪～…麻烦、糟透了、事故事故…❞

Source: Everyone else worriedly rushed to her, but it didn't seem like a big deal.
Target: 其他人担心地冲了过来，但似乎没什么大问题。
小叶子的后颈看起来好惆怅！！

Source: Let me finish what I have to say～.
Are you craving for a hamburger that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃汉堡吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about hamburger again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着汉堡了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into hamburgers, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢汉堡，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than hamburgers for once.
Target: 够了，换点别的东西想想吧，别老是汉堡。

Source: Do you want to eat a Tongari Corn that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃玉米锥吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about Tongari Corn again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着玉米锥了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into Tongari Corn, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢玉米锥，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than Tongari Corn too.
Target: 够了，换点别的东西想想吧，别老是玉米锥。

Source: Do you want to eat Gari in a conveyor belt sushi bar that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃回转寿司里的姜片吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about Gari again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着姜片了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into Gari, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢姜片，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than conveyor belt sushi bars and Gari.
Target: 够了，换点别的东西想想吧，别老是寿司和姜片。

Source: You want raw yatsuhashi with no red bean paste that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃不带红豆馅的生八桥吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Yatsuhashi again? It's clear from the way you bat. You really want no red bean paste?
Target: 又在八桥了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。你真的想要不带红豆馅的吗？

Source: I didn't know you were so against red bean paste in yatsuhashi. It's totally clear from how you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么讨厌八桥里的红豆馅。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than raw yatsuhashi with no red bean jam.
Target: 够了，换点别的东西想想吧，别老是不带红豆馅的生八桥。

Source: Do you want to eat poisonous mushrooms that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃毒蘑菇吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about obviously poisonous mushrooms again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着明显有毒的蘑菇了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into poisonous mushrooms, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢毒蘑菇，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, at least think about edible mushrooms sometimes too.
Target: 够了，至少想些能吃的蘑菇吧。

Source: Do you want to eat bruised bananas that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃有伤的香蕉吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about bruised bananas again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着有伤的香蕉了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into gambling with raw oysters, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢赌生蚝，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think about ripe yellow bananas sometimes too.
Target: 够了，偶尔想想熟透的黄香蕉吧。

Source: Do you want to eat an omelette with a ketchup heart that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃画着心形番茄酱的蛋包饭吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about a heart-marked omelette again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着画着心形的蛋包饭了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into heart-marked omelette, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢画着心形的蛋包饭，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think about ordinary omelettes sometimes too.
Target: 够了，偶尔想想普通的蛋包饭吧。

Source: Do you want to gamble your life eating a raw oyster that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想冒险吃生蚝吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about gambling your life on a raw oyster again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着冒险吃生蚝了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already. You should think of how painful it'd be to get food poisoning from it sometimes.
Target: 够了。也想想食物中毒有多痛苦吧。

Source: Do you want to eat an unknown lifeform with 15 feet that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想吃有15只脚的不明生命体吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into 15-foot unknown lifeforms, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢有15只脚的不明生命体，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think about those lifeforms with 8 or 10 feet sometimes too.
Target: 够了，偶尔想想那些有8只或10只脚的生命体吧。

Source: Do you want yogurt that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝酸奶吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about yogurt again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着酸奶了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into yogurt, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢酸奶，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than yogurt too.
Target: 够了，想点酸奶以外的东西吧。

Source: Do you want fresh milk that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝鲜牛奶吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about fresh milk again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着鲜牛奶了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into fresh milk, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢鲜牛奶，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than fresh milk too.
Target: 够了，想点鲜牛奶以外的东西吧。

Source: Do you want tropical coconut milk that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝热带椰奶吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about tropical coconut milk again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着热带椰奶了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into coconut milk, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢椰奶，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than tropical coconut milk too.
Target: 够了，想点椰奶以外的东西吧。

Source: Do you want erotic juice that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝色情饮料吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about erotic juice again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着色情饮料了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into erotic juice, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢色情饮料，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than erotic juice too.
Target: 够了，想点色情饮料以外的东西吧。

Source: Do you want to drink mayonnaise that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝蛋黄酱吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about mayonnaise again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着蛋黄酱了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into mayonnaise, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢蛋黄酱，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already, think of something other than mayonnaise sometimes too.
Target: 够了，偶尔想些蛋黄酱以外的东西吧。

Source: Do you want to drink hot coffee with a straw that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想用吸管喝热咖啡吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about drinking hot coffee with a straw again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着用吸管喝热咖啡了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into hot coffee, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢热咖啡，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Give it a rest already. You should learn you can't avoid getting burned forever.
Target: 够了。学着接受被烫伤是无法避免的。

Source: Do you want to drink undiluted Calpis that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么想喝未稀释的可尔必思吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Thinking about undiluted Calpis again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 又在想着未稀释的可尔必思了？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I didn't know you were so into undiluted Calpis, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: 没想到你这么喜欢未稀释的可尔必思，理树。从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: "Give it a rest already. You should mix it with some water."
Target: 够了，应该加点水稀释一下。
别告诉我这就是全部了！

Source: Incredible... Never expected to find such a raw diamond here.
Target: 不可思议…从未想到这里会有这样的璞玉。

Source: If you keep playing baseball, you can even aim for the pros...
Target: 如果你继续打棒球，甚至可以能成为职业球员…

Source: Eight! Am I witnessing a miracle!?
Target: 八球！难道我见证了奇迹！？

Source: Weren't you born to play baseball!?
Target: 难道你天生就是为了打棒球！？

Source: Why are you wasting your time here, you have some serious talent!
Target: 你为什么在这里浪费时间，你真有天赋！

Source: Ten... What the hell are you!?
Target: 十球…你究竟是什么怪物！？

Source: You can even beat the pros as you are now!
Target: 现在的你甚至能打败职业选手！

Source: That's enough, I already understand well how great you are.
Target: 够了，我已经很清楚你有多厉害了。

Source: Twelve, you're a God of Batting!
That's enough, you are doing great.
It was just a small compliment, don't get carried away!
Target: 这只是个小小的称赞，不要得意忘形！

Source: Just how good are you at sports?
I didn't mean to aim at you, but I hope you now understand how the cats felt.
Target: 我不是故意瞄准你的，但你现在知道猫的感受了吧。

Source: That ball was from the cats.
It's not like I'm aiming at you!
Was it me!? Was it my fault!?
I didn't mean to do that!!
They'll start avoiding me because of you!
Target: 它们会因为你而开始躲着我的！

Source: How many times does this make!?

Target: 你是故意瞄着它们的吗！？

Source: How many times does that make!
Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!?
Target: 你是不是对猫有不好的回忆！？

Source: Stop venting your anger on cats!
Target: 别把你的愤怒发泄在猫身上！

Source: Is that your idea of fun!?
Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!
Target: 你是不是对猫有不好的回忆！？

Source: Ha ra ho ro hi ree...
Today just became my catching anniversary day.
Target: 今天成了我的接球纪念日。

Source: Ichiro-san threw a laser beam in the pasture.
Target: 一郎先生在牧场里投出了一记激光球。

Source: The throwing method directly taught by Kyousuke-san!
Target: 这是恭介先生亲自教的投球方法！

Source: Do you know why baseballs are white?
Target: 你知道为什么棒球是白色的吗？

Source: Maybe you should consider switching to some other sport.
Target: 也许你应该考虑换个运动。

Source: Won't you hit a ❛Terrifying: the Vanishing Ball❜ or something, sometimes?
Target: 难道你不会打出什么❛恐怖的消失球❜之类的吗？

Source: At least try to get it past the infield.
Target: 至少试着把球打过内野。

Source: Suro-ingu! Aimu suro-inga-... That's so hard to pronounce...
Target: 投掷！我在投掷～…真难发音…

Source: Haruchin Unlimited Ultra Super Dynamic Miracle Hyper Ultimate Global Excellent Delicious Bombard Power Throwing!!
Target: 小叶子无限超级动态奇迹终极全球美味炸弹力量投掷！！

Source: I'll get it, I'll get it～.
Target: 我会接到的，我会接到的～。

Source: This isn't the majors, you know.
Well, there are days like this too.
Target: 嗯，有时候会有这样的日子。

Source: Every dog has its day, as the saying goes...
Target: 正如俗话所说，风水轮流转…

Source: Do you hold a grudge against me or something...
Target: 你是不是对我怀恨在心…

Source: This time, wasn't it clearly its own fault!?
Target: 这次不是它自己的错吗！？

Source: You could've dodged that just now...

Target: 呜哦里啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！

Source: Naive! How many years have you been batting!?
That can't be all you've got, can it!?
Target: 这就是你全部的实力吗！？

Source: I always thought you were a lot better than that!
Target: 我一直认为你比这更厉害！

Source: This is no time to be sitting around!
Target: 现在可不是坐着不动的时候！

Source: Didn't we make a promise! Though I forgot what it was already!
Target: 我们不是有个约定吗！虽然我已经忘了是什么！

Source: It was supposed to be a promise between just the two of us, though I already told everyone!
Target: 那本该是我们两人的约定，不过我已经告诉大家了！

Source: You were hungry back then. You were kinda fat though.
Target: 那时候你很饿。你那时候有点胖呢。

Source: You should starve some more, starve s-o-m-e more...
Target: 你应该再多饿一会儿，多饿一会儿…

Source: You want to come back home as a hero, don't you?
Target: 你不想作为英雄回家吗？

Source: You can't stop here... You must move forward!
Target: 你不能停在这里…你必须向前迈进！

Source: Hahaha, you're getting better too, aren't you?
Target: 哈哈哈，你也变得更厉害了啊。
为什么不打得更用力些？

Source: That's no good, no one'll get fired up from that.
Target: 那可不行，这样没人会激动起来。

Source: You need to heat up more.
Weren't you allergic to pollen, Riki?
Target: 你不是对花粉过敏吗，理树？

Source: A weak ball comes from a weak heart.
Target: 软弱的球来自软弱的心。

Source: Are you getting used to it yet?
What are you anxious about? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你在担心什么？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I won't let this one go.
This is not bad at all.
That was no sweat at all.
That was like the buzz of a mosquito.
Target: 这就像蚊子嗡嗡一样简单。

Source: This catch is proof of our bonds!
Target: 这次的接球是我们羁绊的证明！

Source: What's wrong? Run out of steam already, huh?
Target: 怎么了？已经筋疲力尽了吗？

Source: Did you start worrying about hair loss? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你开始担心脱发了吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Are you worried about the millennium bug now, of all times? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 现在才担心千年虫问题吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Are you that hungry? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么饿吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Are you that thirsty? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你这么渴吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: I caught that all too easy.
Come on, put some spirit into it...
Haha, not bad at all. Keep at it.
Did coming here launch your rebellious period? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 来这里让你进入叛逆期了吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Have you fallen in love? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你恋爱了吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: You need to exercise diligence daily.
Good, hit another one, hit another one with all your might!
Target: 很好，再打一个，再用尽全力打一个！

Source: Oops, did I catch that naivety of yours?
Target: 哎呀，我是不是感染了你的天真？

Source: Are you at that age already? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你已经到了那个年纪了吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Are you mad about something? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: 你生气了吗？从你的击球方式就能看出来。

Source: Oh, you sure are hard to handle.
It's exactly as you say. You stand correct.
I see. That's how it is. That's only natural.
Target: 原来如此。事情就是这样。这很正常。

Source: Hit this if you think you can...
Mon Petit for everyone, once this is over.
Target: 比赛结束后请大家吃Mon Petit。

Source: I wonder if there's any Mon Petit left...
I can't wait for a new flavor Mon Petit to come out.
Target: 真想快点出新的Mon Petit口味。

Source: How can you guys be so cute?
Target: 你们怎么可以这么可爱？

Source: I wanna be a cat just once.
Riki, why don't you turn into a cat sometime too?
Target: 理树，你不妨也变成猫一次？

Source: Riki, did something good happen to you?
Target: 理树，今天发生了什么好事吗？

Source: Riki, did something bad happen to you?
Target: 理树，今天发生了什么坏事吗？
叶 乌拉拉～ 乌拉乌拉～♪

Source: When a doggie barks, Komari runs away...
Target: 当小狗叫的时候，小毬就会跑开…

Source: I wonder if I should go on a diet...
Target: 我在想我是不是该减肥了…

Source: If you're energetic, that makes me energetic as well, fight♪
Target: 如果你充满活力，那也会让我充满活力，加油♪

Source: The wind is talking to me... Tasty, too tasty...
Target: 风在和我说话… 太美味了，太美味了…

Source: ...Can't you do something about the cats?
Target: … 你能不能想办法对付那些猫？

Source: I want to poke a cat's paw pad, but... Gumuu...
Target: 我想戳一下猫咪的肉垫，但是… 咕呜…

Source: I want to drink hot tea～.
Come on, show me what you're made of～.
Target: 来吧，展示一下你的本事～。

Source: To be honest, I'm not getting to move all that much!
Target: 说实话，我没怎么动起来！

Source: Today is truly a perfect Haruchin weather. Whatever that means!
Target: 今天真是个完美的小叶子天气。不管那是什么意思！

Source: It's going to be sunny across the nation tomorrow, with a hint of Haruchin in some areas.
Target: 明天全国都会是晴天，部分地区会有一点小叶子的气息。

Source: This was Haruchin. Thank you for watching Countdown TV.
Target: 这里是小叶子。感谢您收看倒计时电视。

Source: Good evening. The time is 19:55, it's Haruchin in the night.
Target: 晚上好。现在是19:55，是夜晚的小叶子。

Source: Please let me know right away if you get hurt.
Target: 如果你受伤了，请马上告诉我。

Source: If I suddenly say Japan, will that make people laugh?
Target: 如果我突然说日本，会让人发笑吗？

Source: If I suddenly say I used to be a total motorcycle rider, will that make people laugh?
Target: 如果我突然说我曾经是个彻头彻尾的摩托车骑手，会让人发笑吗？

Source: I seem to have gone unnoticed...
They sure are taking it easy...

Target: 我在想那是不是很有趣…

Source: Not that I'm feeling envious or anything...
Target: 我可不是在嫉妒什么的…

Source: Riki-kun, you're more manly than I thought...
Target: 理树君，你比我想象的还要有男子气概…

Source: I'm rooting for you from the back, Riki-kun.
Target: 我在后面为你加油，理树君。

Source: What's your relationship with that girl!?
Target: 你和那个女孩是什么关系！？

Source: That girl, I'm suspecting she has her eyes on Riki-kun...
Target: 那个女孩，我怀疑她对理树君有意思…

Source: That girl, just because she's a little pretty...
Target: 那个女孩，就因为她有点漂亮…

Source: You're being such a blockhead, Riki-kun...
I never know where it comes flying from.
Target: 我从来不知道它是从哪里飞来的。

Source: I think I'm getting the hang of it.
Target: 我想我已经有点上手了。

Source: I think I'm only so skilled yet...
Target: 我想我也就这么点本事了…

Source: Getting the hang of it, Rin?
It's hard to bat trying not to hit the cats...
Target: 打球的时候尽量不打到猫还真难…

Source: I can't guarantee I won't hit them, you know?
Target: 我可不能保证不会打到它们哦？

Source: I wish I'd played sports before...
Target: 我真希望我以前有参加过运动…

Source: Can I suddenly become good, I wonder...
Target: 我突然就能变得厉害吗，我在想…

Source: Muscles are passing by! Bulky muscles are passing by!
Target: 肌肉路过！强壮的肌肉路过！

Source: Muscles are passing by! Quite some muscles are passing by!
Target: 肌肉路过！相当壮的肌肉路过！

Source: Muscles are passing by! Thank you for your cooperation!
Target: 肌肉路过！感谢您的配合！

Source: Muscles are passing by! Enormous muscles are passing by!
Target: 肌肉路过！巨大的肌肉路过！

Source: The Muscle Exchange thanks you for your continued patronage.
Target: 肌肉交易所感谢您的持续光顾。

Source: This is Muscles, heading out to the site now.
Target: 我是肌肉，现在要去现场了。

Source: This is Quite Some Muscles, heading out to the site now.
Target: 我是相当壮的肌肉，现在要去现场了。

Source: This is Enormous Muscles, heading out to the site now.
Target: 我是巨大的肌肉，现在要去现场了。

Source: Muscle is taking off, please mind the gap.
Target: 肌肉出发了，请小心缝隙。

Source: Hu... hu... my muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!
Target: 呼… 呼… 我的肌肉在尖叫！它们在尖叫！

Source: Ohh, this is one huge scream!
Oh my god, this screaming is too much for me to take!
Target: 哦，我的天啊，这尖叫声我实在受不了了！

Source: Uoooo, my muscles are running wild! They're rioting!
Target: 呜哦哦，我的肌肉在疯狂躁动！它们在暴动！
这是… 肌肉革命啊啊啊！！

Source: Sultry muscles are passing by. Please make way.
Target: 性感的肌肉路过。请让一让。

Source: Please make way, sultry muscles are passing by.
Target: 请让一让，性感的肌肉路过。

Source: Wait up, you muscles over there. You're too sultry, you need to stop.
Target: 等等，那边的肌肉们。你们太性感了，得停下来。

Source: The most important thing is team play.

Target: 我们必须加深彼此的羁绊！

Source: Great. Keep at it. We must deepen our bonds.
Target: 太棒了。继续加油。我们必须加深彼此的羁绊。

Source: Don't be afraid to ruin your clothes, there is value in that also.
Target: 不要害怕弄脏衣服，那也是有价值的。

Source: Don't be afraid to wear yourself out, there is value in that also.
Target: 不要害怕累坏自己，那也是有价值的。

Source: Alright, we have an awesome team.
Target: 好的，我们有一支很棒的队伍。

Source: They can do it, I just know they can do it.
Target: 他们一定可以的，我就知道他们一定可以。

Source: %s returned the title ❝%s❞ and became the ❝Provisional Ruler of the Battle Rankings❞
Target: %s归还了称号❝%s❞，成为了『战斗排位赛的暂定王者』

Source: The gathered onlookers throw in one weapon after another!
Target: 围观者一件接一件地扔出武器！
